1e: {@spell symbol} (choosing between the discord, fear, and pain options)

trait.name: Duergar Resilience
entries: The duergar has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being {@condition charmed} or {@condition paralyzed}.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the duergar has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Weave Rune
entries: The duergar psionically targets a creature that it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} saving throw or have a visible, glowing rune magically appear on its forehead. The type of saving throw required depends on the rune used. A rune is activated the next time the target takes an action or moves, causing the rune to disappear as its effect takes place. Unless a rune has been activated, the target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, causing the rune to disappear and ending the effect on a successful save. The duergar chooses one of the following runes:

action.name: Ild Rune
entries: The ild rune glows a fiery red and requires a Dexterity saving throw. When activated, the target takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage and ignites in white-hot flames. While ignited, the target takes another 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns. The effect ends if the target or a creature within 5 feet of it uses an action to put out the flames, or if some other effect douses the flames (such as the target being submerged in water).

action.name: Stein Rune
entries: The stein rune glows a dull gray and requires a Constitution saving throw. When activated, the target begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn.

On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is {@condition petrified}. The petrification lasts for 1 minute or until the creature is freed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.

action.name: Vind Rune
entries: The vind rune glows a crisp white and requires a Strength saving throw. When activated, the target's space is filled by a strong wind (30 miles per hour) that remains centered on the target. While the target is in the wind, unprotected flames that are torch-sized or smaller are extinguished, vapor, gas, and fog that can be dispersed by strong wind is hedged out, and the target's movement speed is halved. In addition, the target is {@condition deafened}, can't benefit from a flying speed, and any ranged weapon attacks the target makes are made with disadvantage. The wind disperses if the target spends a turn without taking any actions and without moving.

action.name: Enlarge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: For 1 minute, the duergar magically increases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying.

monster.name: Duergar Psion-Geist
languages: understands Dwarvish and Undercommon but can't speak

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The psion-geist's innate spellcasting ability is following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Invisibility
entries: The psion-geist is {@condition invisible}.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The psion-geist has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Psionic Nature
entries: The psion-geist can't regain hit points. It can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain, but it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if he ends his turn inside an object.

trait.name: Psychic Mirror
entries: If the psion-geist takes psychic damage, each creature of the psion-geist's choice within 10 feet of it takes that damage instead; the psiongeist takes none of the damage. In addition, the psion-geist's thoughts and location can't be discerned by magic.

trait.name: Scouring Presence
entries: Each of the psion-geist's allies within 30 feet of it can use its reaction at any time to make a single melee weapon attack by taking 3 ({@damage 1d6}) psychic damage. A creature immune to psychic damage can't be affected by Scouring Presence.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the psion-geist has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Turn Resistance
entries: The psion-geist has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The psion-geist makes three attacks with its psychic slam.

action.name: Psychic Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 30 ft., one creature. {@h}21 ({@damage 6d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Telekinetic Thrust
entries: The psion-geist targets a creature or unattended object within 60 feet of it. A creature must be Large or smaller to be affected by this magic, and an object can weigh up to 600 pounds.

If the target is a creature, the psion-geist makes a Charisma check contested by the target's Strength check. If the psion-geist wins the contest, the psion-geist hurls the target up to 60 feet in any direction, including upward.
If the target then comes into contact with a hard surface or heavy object, the target takes {@damage 1d6} damage per 10 feet moved.

If the target is an object that isn't being worn or carried, the psion-geist hurls it up to 60 feet in any direction. The psion-geist can use the object as a ranged weapon, attacking one creature along the object's path ({@hit 8} to hit) and dealing 20 ({@damage 8d4}) bludgeoning damage on a hit.

action.name: Possession
entries: One willing duergar that the psion-geist can see within 5 feet of it is possessed by the psion-geist; the psion-geist then disappears, and the target is {@condition incapacitated} and loses control of its body. The psion-geist now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The psion-geist can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, except ones that turn undead, and it retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, immunity to being {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened}, as well as its Multiattack, Psychic Slam, and Telekinetic Thrust actions, and its traits other than the Invisibility trait. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics.

The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 hit points, the psion-geist ends it as a bonus action, or the psion-geist is turned or forced out by an effect like the {@spell dispel evil and good} spell. When the possession ends, the psiongeist reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body.

headerEntries: The sedep's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 19}). The sedep can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Eerie Presence
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the sedep must succeed a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the sedep until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The sedep can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Virulent Addiction
entries: The sedep carries this horrific disease but is immune to its effects. An infected creature makes ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws that use Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution with advantage, but it makes ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws that use Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma with disadvantage. These effects last for 8 hours. After this time, an infected creature also makes ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws that use Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution with disadvantage, unless it is subjected to a fresh dose of this disease, which then counts as being subjected to the disease for the first time. The disease lasts until cured.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sedep attacks once with its bite and twice with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 18}). Until this grapple ends, the sedep can target the {@condition grappled} creature with its {@spell dissonant whispers} spell using a bonus action, and the sedep can't bite another target.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw against disease. On a failed save, the target takes 26 ({@damage 4d12}) psychic damage and is affected by the sedep's Virulent Addiction trait. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and suffers no other effects.

trait.name: Droning Madness
entries: When the sucurb flies, its wings create a maddening droning sound to which entoceans are immune. Any other creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the sucurb and can hear the sound, must make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature suffers the effect of the {@spell confusion} spell until the start of its next turn (without making a saving throw). The sucurb must use its concentration to stay aloft.

trait.name: Eerie Presence
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the sucurb must succeed a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the sucurb until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The sucurb can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sucurb uses its Plague of Locusts, if available. It then makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Plague of Locusts (1/Day)
entries: A swarm of Tiny locusts drones out of orifices on the sucurb's back, creating the effect of the {@spell insect plague} spell (save {@dc 16}).
The effect lasts for 10 minutes. The sucurb is immune to plague's effects, can move the plague up to 80 feet as a bonus action on each of its turns, and doesn't need to concentrate on the effect.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The suloenara's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}). The suloenara can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Eerie Presence
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the suloenara must succeed a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the suloenara until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Maze Mastery
entries: The suloenara can't become lost by any means and is immune to the effects of the {@spell maze} spell.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The suloenara can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The suloenara can use its Relinquish Flesh. It then makes five attacks: one with its bite and four with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw against poison or take 13 ({@damage 2d12}) psychic damage and become {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.
If a creature is reduced to 0 hit points from this attack, the suloenara tears off one of the target's limbs from its body (chosen randomly) and consumes it.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Entocean Mucus
entries: The suloenara ejects a foul-smelling mucus, targeting a point it can see within 60 feet of it. A 5-foot-radius pool of fleshy mucus appears centered on that point. Each non-entocean creature standing in the pool when it appears must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, the target falls {@condition prone} and is engulfed by the mucus.

An engulfed creature can't breathe and is {@condition blinded}, {@condition deafened}, and {@condition restrained} until it is freed from the mucus. A creature, including the engulfed creature itself, can use its action to make a {@dc 16} Strength (Athletics) check, freeing the engulfed creature on a successful check.
The pool of mucus created is difficult terrain to non-entocean creatures and disappears after 24 hours if no entoceans are within 1 mile of it.

action.name: Relinquish Flesh {@recharge}
entries: The suloenara emits a psychic pulse that tears at the imagination of its victims. Each humanoid within 60 feet of the suloenara must make a {@dc 17} Charisma saving throw. A {@condition frightened} creature has disadvantage on the roll. On a failed save, a creature's mind is wrecked with horrible images of its body falling apart for 4 hours. During this time, it can't benefit from resting or from immunity to the {@condition frightened} condition, and it makes ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws with disadvantage.
A {@spell greater restoration} spell or similar magic ends the effect.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The surupni's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 22}). The surupni can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Agony of the Forsaken
entries: The surupni carries this contagious disease but is immune to its effects. An infected creature can't see or hear further than 10 feet, can't concentrate on spells and effects, and at the start of each of its turns it takes 6 ({@damage 1d12}) psychic damage for each ally that it can see. If an unaffected creature touches the diseased creature or is touched by it, the unaffected creature must succeed a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw or also be affected by the disease. The disease lasts until cured.

trait.name: Eerie Presence
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the surupni must succeed a {@dc 22} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the surupni until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the surupni is in its miasma form and remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal vapor.

trait.name: Otherworldly Ambition (Entocean Form Only)
entries: At the end of a hostile creature's turn, roll a {@dice d6}. On a roll of 5-6, the surupni can immediately either use an action or move before the next creature in the initiative order takes its turn.
If two or more creatures in combat would get to act due to this trait, instead choose only one creature to act.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The surupni can use its action to polymorph into a 20-foot-ra- dius miasma of black, virulent vapors, or back into its true form. The miasma spreads around corners, and its area is heavily obscured. While in this form, the surupni's only method of movement is a flying speed of 10 feet. The surupni can enter and occupy the space of another creature and can pass through small holes, narrow openings, and even mere cracks, though it treats liquids as though they were solid surfaces. The surupni has advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws but otherwise retains its statistics, though it can't benefit from being {@condition invisible}. The surupni can't fall and remains hovering in the air even when {@condition incapacitated}. While miasma form, the surupni can't manipulate objects, and any objects it was carrying or holding can't be dropped, used, or otherwise interacted with. The surupni transforms back into its true form if it dies.

The first time on a turn that a creature enters the miasma or starts its turn in there, it takes 26 ({@damage 4d12}) psychic damage and it must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw against disease or be affected by the surupni's Agony of the Forsaken trait.

trait.name: Spider Climb (Entocean Form Only)
entries: The surupni can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The surupni can use its Isolation. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite (Entocean Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw against disease or be affected by the surupni's Agony of the Forsaken trait.

action.name: Tentacle (Entocean Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 22}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the surupni can't use this tentacle on another target. The surupni has two tentacles.

action.name: Isolation {@recharge}
entries: The surupni emits a psychic pulse that tears at the sensory abilities of its victims. Each creature within 20 feet of the surupni must make a {@dc 22} Charisma saving throw. A {@condition frightened} creature has disadvantage on the roll. On a failed save, a creature's perception is psionically diminished for 1 hour. During this time, an affected creature can't perceive any of its allies; if it attempts to enter a space occupied by an ally, its mind makes up a convoluted rationale for the hindrance.
A {@spell greater restoration} spell or similar magic ends the effect.

monster.name: Entoling
languages: understands Common and Entocean but can't speak

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The entoling can innately cast the mage hand spell (the hand is invisible), requiring no components. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The entoling can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

reaction.name: Telepathic Conscience
entries: When a creature that the entoling can see within 30 feet performs an evil or good act, the entoling sends a telepathic message to the creature. The message is in Entocean, but the target can somehow understand its meaning: "calamity" if the act is evil, or "wonder" if the act is good.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The sutem's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 25}). The sutem can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Eerie Presence
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the sutem must succeed on a {@dc 25} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the sutem until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Feed on Fear
entries: A {@condition frightened} creature deals only half damage to the sutem. In addition, at the start of each of its turns, the sutem regains 10 hit points for each {@condition frightened} creature within 30 feet of it.

trait.name: Hive Hub
entries: The sutem continuously perceives through and reads the minds of every other entoceans on the same plane of existence, except for other sutems. It can communicate its thoughts and observations to each entocean it is connected to in this manner.

trait.name: Inscrutable
entries: The sutem is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the sutem's intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the sutem fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Otherworldly Ambition
entries: At the end of a hostile creature's turn, roll a {@dice d6}. On a roll of 4-6, the sutem can immediately either use an action or move before the next creature in the initiative order takes its turn. If two or more creatures in combat would get to act due to this trait, instead choose only one creature to act.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The sutem can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Warp Thoughts
entries: Using a bonus action, the sutem magically detects, reads, and warps the surface thoughts of up to six creatures within 300 feet of it.

The effect can penetrate barriers, but 3 feet of wood or dirt, 2 feet of stone, 2 inches of metal, or a thin sheet of lead blocks it. While the target is in range, the sutem can continue touching its thoughts, as long as the sutem's concentration isn't broken (as if concentrating on a spell). While warping a target's mind, the sutem has advantage on Wisdom (Insight) and Charisma (Deception, Intimidation, and Persuasion) checks against the target, and the sutem can choose for a target to be unable to see or hear it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sutem uses its Font of Fear, Psychic Pulse, or Unsettled Mind, if it can. It then makes two tentacle attacks and uses its Psychic Crush twice.
It can replace a tentacle attack with a wing attack.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 4d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 25}) and takes 21 ({@damage 2d12 + 8}) psychic damage at the start of each of its turns until the grapple ends. The sutem can have up to ten targets {@condition grappled} at a time.

action.name: Psychic Crush
entries: The sutem targets one creature that it can sense within 60 feet of it. The target must make a {@dc 25} Charisma saving throw, taking 26 ({@damage 4d12}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Wing Attack
entries: The sutem beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the sutem must succeed on a {@dc 25} Dexterity saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The sutem can then fly up to half its flying speed.

action.name: Psychic Pulse
entries: The sutem targets a creature within 120 feet of it that is affected by the sutem's Warp Thoughts trait. Enemies of the sutem within 30 feet of that creature take 39 ({@damage 6d12}) psychic damage.

action.name: Font of Fear {@recharge 5}
entries: The sutem emits a wave of psychic energy that tears at the soul of its victims. Each creature within 30 feet of the sutem must make a {@dc 25} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 65 ({@damage 10d12}) psychic damage; if the creature is {@condition frightened}, it is also {@condition paralyzed} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition paralyzed}.

action.name: Unsettled Mind {@recharge 4}
entries: The sutem emits a wave of psychic energy that fills its victims with a deep and unshakable dread. Each creature of the sutem's choice within 60 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 25} Charisma saving throw or be unable to benefit from immunity to the {@condition frightened} condition for 1 hour.
A {@spell greater restoration} spell or similar magic ends the effect.

trait.name: Bound Together
entries: The formian shares its mind with every other formian within 1 mile of it, and can communicate its thoughts and observations to them instantaneously and without limitation.

trait.name: Hive Mind
entries: The formian is immune to the {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened} conditions while within 30 feet of at least one other formian.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The formian can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Mandibles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Bound Together
entries: The formian shares its mind with every other formian within 1 mile of it, and can communicate its thoughts and observations to them instantaneously and without limitation.

trait.name: Hive Mind
entries: The formian is immune to the {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened} conditions while within 30 feet of at least one other formian.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The formian has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The formian can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The formian makes three weapon attacks, only one of which can be either with its mandibles or its stinger.

action.name: Mandibles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage. The target must make a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (at will)
headerEntries: The formian can innately cast dominate monster (spell save {@dc 15}). Its spellcasting ability is Charisma.

trait.name: Bound Together
entries: The formian shares its mind with every other formian within 1 mile of it, and can communicate its thoughts and observations to them instantaneously and without limitation.

trait.name: Hive Mind
entries: The formian is immune to the {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened} conditions while within 30 feet of at least one other formian.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The formian has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The formian can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Universal Tongue
entries: The formian can use its telepathy to communicate with any creature that can understand at least one language.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The formian makes two attacks with its claws and one with its stinger.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage. The target must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Bound Together
entries: The formian shares its mind with every other formian within 1 mile of it, and can communicate its thoughts and observations to them instantaneously and without limitation.

trait.name: Hive Mind
entries: The formian is immune to the {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened} conditions while within 30 feet of at least one other formian.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The formian has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The formian regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn. The formian dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The formian can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The formian makes three javelin attacks. It can replace one javelin attack with a mandible attack or a stinger attack.

action.name: Mandibles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 4d6 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) piercing damage. The target must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The formian queen's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material or verbal components:

trait.name: Bound Together
entries: The formian queen shares its mind with every other formian within 1 mile of it, and can communicate its thoughts and observations to them instantaneously and without limitation.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the formian queen fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The formian queen has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The formian queen regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn.
The formian queen dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points.

trait.name: Universal Tongue
entries: The formian queen can use its telepathy to communicate with any creature that can understand at least one language.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The formian makes two attacks in any combination.

action.name: Mandibles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 6d6 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Barbed Spine
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 12} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d4 + 7}) piercing damage.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The formian queen makes one attack.

legendary.name: Hive Pulse
entries: The formian queen sends out a telepathic pulse, bolstering all other formians within 1 mile. Bolstered formians make attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws with advantage until the end of the formian queen's next turn.

legendary.name: Trembling Strike (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The formian queen strikes the ground with her powerful hind legs, triggering an earth tremor. All other creatures on the ground that lack the Spider Climb trait within 60 feet of the formian queen must succeed on a {@dc 20} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (3/Day)
headerEntries: The gnome can innately cast misty step. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence.

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: The gnome can take a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

trait.name: Gnome Cunning
entries: The gnome has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

trait.name: Master Thief
entries: The gnome has a +5 bonus to skill checks made with thieves' tools.

trait.name: Subrace
entries: The gnome has one of the following subraces:

trait.name: Deep Gnome
entries: The gnome's darkvision increases to 120 feet, and it has advantage on Dexterity (stealth) checks to hide in rocky terrain.

trait.name: Forest Gnome
entries: The gnome can communicate simple ideas with Small or smaller beasts through sounds and gestures. In addition, the gnome can cast the {@spell minor illusion} cantrip, using Intelligence as its spellcasting ability.

trait.name: Rock Gnome
entries: The gnome gains a +2 bonus when making an Intelligence (History) check related to magic items, alchemical objects, or technological devices. In addition, the gnome gets a +2 bonus to checks made with tinker's tools.

trait.name: Spriggan
entries: Once per day, the gnome can use an action to become Huge for 1 minute.

trait.name: Urdlen's Saliva
entries: The gnome's weapons are coated with Urdlen's saliva. If the gnome hits a creature with a weapon attack, the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. While {@condition poisoned} in this manner, the creature is also {@condition paralyzed}. A {@condition poisoned} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a successful save.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gnome attacks twice times with its shortsword or its darts.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, ranged 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Blood Shield
entries: When a creature that doesn't have all its hit points damages the gnome with an attack, roll a {@dice d6}. On a roll of 4 or higher, the gnome takes half damage from the attack.

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: The gnome can take a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

trait.name: Gnome Cunning
entries: The gnome has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

trait.name: Subrace
entries: The gnome has one of the following subraces:

trait.name: Deep Gnome
entries: The gnome's darkvision increases to 120 feet, and it has advantage on Dexterity (stealth) checks to hide in rocky terrain.

trait.name: Forest Gnome
entries: The gnome can communicate simple ideas with Small or smaller beasts through sounds and gestures. In addition, the gnome can cast the {@spell minor illusion} cantrip, using Intelligence as its spellcasting ability.

trait.name: Rock Gnome
entries: The gnome gains a +2 bonus when making an Intelligence (History) check related to magic items, alchemical objects, or technological devices. In addition, the gnome gets a +2 bonus to checks made with tinker's tools.

trait.name: Spriggan
entries: Once per day, the gnome can use an action to become Huge for 1 minute.

trait.name: Urdlen's Saliva
entries: The gnome's weapons are coated with Urdlen's saliva. If the gnome hits a creature with a weapon attack, the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. While {@condition poisoned} in this manner, the creature is also {@condition paralyzed}. A {@condition poisoned} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a successful save.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gnome attacks twice with its rapier or its darts.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, ranged 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

monster.name: Weremole
senses: blindsight 120 ft. (blind beyond this radius, mole and hybrid form only)

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Blood Frenzy (Mole and Hybrid Form Only)
entries: The weremole has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Cunning Action (Humanoid Form Only)
entries: The weremole can take a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

trait.name: Gnome Cunning
entries: The weremole has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The weremole has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Subrace (Humanoid Form Only)
entries: The weremole has one of the following subraces:

trait.name: Deep Gnome
entries: The weremole gains darkvision out to 120 feet, and it has advantage on Dexterity (stealth) checks to hide in rocky terrain.

trait.name: Forest Gnome
entries: The weremole can communicate simple ideas with Small or smaller beasts through sounds and gestures. In addition, the weremole can cast the {@spell minor illusion} cantrip, using Intelligence as its spellcasting ability.

trait.name: Rock Gnome
entries: The weremole gains a +2 bonus when making an Intelligence (History) check related to magic items, alchemical objects, or technological devices. In addition, the weremole gets a +2 bonus to checks made with tinker's tools.

trait.name: Spriggan
entries: Once per day, the weremole can use an action to become Huge for 1 minute.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The weremole can use its action to polymorph into a Medium mole-humanoid hybrid, or into a Large dead-white mole, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: In humanoid form, the weremole makes three rapier attacks or two {@condition poisoned} dart attacks. In mole form, it makes one bite attack and one claw attack. In hybrid form, it can attack either as in humanoid form or as in mole form.

action.name: Bite (Hybrid or Mole Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) necrotic damage.

If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. While {@condition poisoned} in this manner, the creature is also {@condition paralyzed}. A {@condition poisoned} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a successful save.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) slashing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 1d10}) necrotic damage at the start of each of its turns due to a festering wound. Each time the weremole hits the wounded target with this attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 5 ({@dice 1d10}). Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful {@dc 13} Wisdom (Medicine) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.

action.name: Rapier (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Poisoned Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, ranged 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) piercing damage. plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) poison damage.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the bugbear hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If the bugbear surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage from the attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bugbear makes two melee or ranged attacks.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage in melee or 7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage at range.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (3/Day)
headerEntries: The bugbear can cast the jump, knock and silence spells, requiring no components. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the bugbear hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: On each of his turns, the bugbear can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

trait.name: Heart of Grankhul
entries: The bugbear has advantage on ability checks and saving throws that use Dexterity. In addition, if it rolls a Dexterity (Stealth) check of 25 or higher, the bugbear becomes {@condition invisible} along with anything it is wearing or carrying. It remains {@condition invisible} until it attacks or casts a spell, or until it takes a bonus action to end the effect.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The bugbear deals an extra 35 ({@damage 10d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the death striker that isn't incapacitated and the bugbear doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If the bugbear surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 35 ({@damage 10d6}) damage from the attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bugbear makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage in melee or 7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage at range.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals two extra dice of its damage when the bugbear hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Heart of Hruggek
entries: The bugbear has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition paralyzed}, {@condition poisoned}, {@condition stunned}, or put to sleep.

trait.name: Hruggek's Rage (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Using a bonus action, the bugbear can enter a rage at the start of its turn. The rage lasts for 1 minute or until the bugbear is {@condition incapacitated}. While raging, the bugbear gains the following benefits:

items: The bugbear has advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws
When it makes a melee weapon attack, the bugbear gains a +3 bonus to the damage roll.
The bugbear has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of his turn, the bugbear can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If the destroyer surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 35 ({@damage 10d6}) damage from the attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bugbear makes three morningstar attacks. It can replace one attack with a grapple. If all three attacks target the same creature, the target must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw after the last attack hits or misses. On a failed save, the target takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) lightning damage and is {@condition stunned} until the end of the destroyer's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition stunned}.

action.name: Versatile Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) piercing damage, or 21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) piercing damage if wielded with two hands.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) piercing damage in melee or 8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage at range.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The bugbear adds 4 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it.
To do so, the bugbear must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of damage when the bugbear hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Heart of Hruggek
entries: The bugbear has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition paralyzed}, {@condition poisoned}, {@condition stunned}, or put to sleep.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of each of its turns, the bugbear can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If the bugbear surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage from the attack.

trait.name: Wanton Destruction
entries: The bugbear adds twice its Strength modifier to its melee weapon attacks (included in the attack), and the damage it deals can't be reduced by any means.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bugbear makes two melee weapon attacks.

action.name: Two-Handed Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target, {@h}21 ({@damage 2d12 + 8}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Feed on Fear
entries: The specter regains lost hit points equal to half the psychic damage it deals to a creature {@condition frightened} of it.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The specter can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Invisibility
entries: The specter is {@condition invisible}.

trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If the specter surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage from the attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The specter makes two attacks.

action.name: Touch of Skiggaret
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 30 ft., one creature. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) psychic damage and the target must succeed a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the condition for itself on a successful save.

trait.name: Booyahg
entries: The goblin is a 1st-level booyahg crafter. Its booyahg ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 11}, {@hit 3} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following artificer spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): mending, shocking grasp
1st level (2 slots): alarm, grease

trait.name: Machinist
entries: The goblin has advantage on checks related to driving vehicles and controlling other machinery.

trait.name: Mechanical Familiar
entries: The goblin has a mechanical familiar with the statistics of a bat, octopus, or rat, but it is a Tiny construct. If the mechanical familiar dies, the goblin can spend 1 hour crafting a replacement.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Tool
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@dice 1d4 + 2}) magical bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Invention
entries: The goblin uses one of the following options (roll a {@dice d8} or choose one); the goblin can use each one no more than once per day:

items.name: 1. Bag of Ball Bearings.
entries: The goblin spills tiny metal balls from a small bag to cover a 10-foot-radius area centered on itself. If the area is not level, the balls roll away and have no effect. A creature moving across the covered area must succeed on a {@dc 10} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}. A creature moving through the area at half speed doesn't need to make the save.

2. Caltrops-in-a-Box. The goblin targets a point it can see within 20 feet with an ingenious invention that explodes outwards, causing caltrops to cover a 10-foot-square area centered on that point. Any creature that enters the area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or stop moving this turn and take 1 piercing damage. Taking this damage reduces the creature's walking speed by 10 feet until the creature regains at least 1 hit point. A creature moving through the area at half speed doesn't need to make the save.

items.name: 3. Explosive Bomb.
entries: The goblin hurls a bomb up to 20 feet away. The bomb explodes on impact. Each creature within 10 feet of the impact must make a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw, taking 5 ({@damage 2d4}) fire damage plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

items.name: 4. Flash Bomb.
entries: The goblin hurls a bomb up to 20 feet away. The bomb explodes on impact. Each creature within 30 feet of the impact that can see it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition blinded} until the end of the goblin's next turn. The goblin automatically succeeds on the saving throw.

items.name: 5. Grappling Hook.
entries: The goblin ejects a grappling hook from a wrist-mount- ed device, targeting any unoccupied space, whether horizontal or vertical, within 30 feet of it. The grappling hook remains connected to the wrist-mounted device by a small wire, which then reels the goblin to the space the grappling hook is in. The goblin remains attached to the grappling hook and the surface the hook is attached to until it uses a bonus action to cut the wire.

items.name: 6. Magnetic Bomb.
entries: The goblin hurls a bomb up to 20 feet away. The bomb explodes on impact. Each creature within 10 feet of the impact must succeed on a {@dc 11} Strength saving throw for each metallic weapon it is holding or drop the weapon in question, which then moves to the bomb's point of impact.

items.name: 7. Smoke Bomb.
entries: The goblin hurls a bomb up to 20 feet away. The bomb explodes on impact. The bomb creates a cloud of black smoke that fills a 10-foot-radius sphere. The area within the cloud is heavily obscured. A strong wind disperses the cloud, which otherwise remains until the end of the goblin's next turn.

items.name: 8. Wheel Board.
entries: The goblin drops a crude, metal board with wheels on the ground before jumping on top of it. Until the end of its turn, the goblin's speed increases to 100 feet, but it can only move in one direction and it can't move uphill. At the end of its turn, the board breaks and the goblin lands {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Last-Ditch Effort
entries: When the goblin dies, it can use its Invention action one last time.

trait.name: Booyahg
entries: The goblin is a 3rd-level booyahg whip. Its booyahg ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 11}, {@hit 3} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): friends, poison spray, thaumaturgy
1st level (4 slots): bane, charm person, inflict wounds
2nd level (2 slots): heat metal, invisibility, suggestion

trait.name: Last Laugh (1/Day)
entries: When the goblin is reduced to 0 hit points, it detonates a jar of chemicals, and any non-goblinoid creature within 10 feet of it must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature is {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. While {@condition poisoned} in this manner, a creature is affected by the {@spell confusion} spell. An affected creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a successful save.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The goblin makes two attacks with its whip.

action.name: Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) slashing damage

action.name: Will of Khurgorbaeyag
entries: The goblin triggers its Last Laugh trait without being reduced to 0 hit points.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Wounded Fury
entries: While it has 10 hit points or fewer, the goblin has advantage on attack rolls. In addition, it deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage to any target it hits with a melee attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The goblin makes one attack with its bite and one with its goblin-sized greataxe.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or larger creature, the goblin attaches to the target. While attached, the goblin can't bite another target. A creature, including the target, can use its action to make a {@dc 14} Strength (Athletics) check, detaching the goblin on a successful check.

action.name: Goblin-Sized Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Shiv Flurry
entries: If the goblin is attached to a creature with its bite, it can force that creature to make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw. The target takes 19 ({@damage 6d4 + 4}) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Nullify Magic
entries: The goblin can activate or deactivate the magic of its totem club using an action. While active, the totem club is surrounded by a
20-foot-radius aura centered on it. The aura functions exactly like an {@spell antimagic field} spell except that the club itself remains unaffected.

If the totem club's magic remains active for 1 minute, or if a creature other than the goblin touches it, the club explodes, forcing each creature within 20 feet of it to make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) necrotic damage and suffers one level of {@condition exhaustion}. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and doesn't suffer {@condition exhaustion}.

trait.name: Booyahg
entries: The goblin is a 1st-level booyahg shaman. Its booyahg ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 10}, {@hit 2} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): mending, thorn whip
1st level (2 slots): thunderwave

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The goblin makes two totem club attacks.

action.name: Totem Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Vandalize
entries: The goblin destroys or sabotages a piece of siege equipment within 5 feet of, causing it to cease functioning. The siege equipment can be repaired with a {@spell mending} spell or by spending 1 hour repairing it with suitable artisan's tools.

trait.name: Bonding
entries: The goblin can magically bond with one dire wolf, guulvorg, winter wolf, wolf, or worg it can see. To do so, it must spend at least 1 hour observing that creature while within 30 feet of it. The bond lasts until the goblin bonds with a different creature or until the bonded creature dies. This bond has the following effects:

items: The goblin and the bonded creature can communicate telepathically with each other at a distance of up to 100 feet.
The goblin can sense the direction and distance to the bonded creature if it is on the same plane of existence.
As an action, the goblin or the bonded creature can sense what the other sees and hears, during which time it loses its own sight and hearing. This effect lasts until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Born to the Saddle
entries: The goblin has advantage on saving throws made to avoid falling off its mount. If it falls off of its mount and descends no more than 10 feet, it can land on its feet if it's not {@condition incapacitated}. Finally, mounting or dismounting a creature costs the goblin only 5 feet of movement, rather than half its speed.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Light Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/80 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Net
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack. {@hit 2} to hit, range 5/15 ft., one Large or smaller creature. {@h}The target is {@condition restrained}. A creature can use its action to make a {@dc 10} Strength check, freeing itself or another creature in a net on a successful check. Dealing 5 slashing damage to the net (AC 10) frees a {@condition restrained} creature without harming it and destroys the net.

trait.name: Animosity
entries: The gorebrute's goblin's animosity grows as it sustains injuries, making it an ever-increasing threat in battle. The effects described below are cumulative and become active when the gorebrute's hit points have been reduced below a certain threshold.

trait.name: Below 261 Hit Points
entries: The gorebrute scores a critical hit with its goreaxe on a roll of 19-20.

trait.name: Below 174 Hit Points
entries: The damage of the gorebrute's Fire Aura increases

trait.name: Below 87 Hit Points
entries: The gorebrute gains 30 temporary hit points at the end of each of its turns and it makes three attacks as part of its Multiattack, rather than two attacks.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals three extra dice of its damage when the gorebrute hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Fire Aura
entries: The gorebrute can activate or deactivate this feature as a bonus action. While active, the gorebrute's eyes are ignited with flame and at the start of each of the gorebrute's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage, and flammable objects in the aura that aren't being worn or carried ignite. A creature that touches the gorebrute or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the gorebrute fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Slaughter-Blessed (1/Round)
entries: Roll a {@dice d6} at the end of each of the gorebrute's turns. On a roll of 5-6, the gorebrute can immediately take another turn in combat.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The gorebrute's long jump is up to 50 feet and its high jump is up to 40 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The destroyer makes two attacks in any combination.

action.name: Goreaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}31 ({@damage 4d12 + 5}) slashing damage.
Fire bolt. Ranged Spell Attack: {@hit 12} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d10}) fire damage. This attack can't be affected by counterspell.

headerEntries: The hobgoblin is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Arcane Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a damaging spell attack if that target is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin and that ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hobgoblin makes three melee attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Lightfooted
entries: The hobgoblin can take the Dash or Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hobgoblin makes three attacks with its shortsword or two attacks with its light crossbow.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target, {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Dual Wielder's Parry
entries: The hobgoblin adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. The hobgoblin must be able to see the attacker and be wielding two melee weapons.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hobgoblin is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Tough Love
entries: If the hobgoblin hits an ally with its greatflail, the display of violence stirs the hearts of other goblinoids. Until the start of the hobgoblin's next turn, each of its allies within 60 feet of is immune to the {@condition frightened} condition and can reroll any failed attack roll, ability check, or saving throw (it must use the new roll).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hobgoblin makes two greatflail attacks.

action.name: Greatflail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature that isn't wielding a shield, the target must make a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Battleborn (5/Day)
entries: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can use one of the options below:

trait.name: Indomitable
entries: The hobgoblin rerolls a failed saving throw.

trait.name: Second Wind
entries: Using a bonus action, the hobgoblin regains 11 ({@dice 2d10}) hit points.

trait.name: Sure-Strike
entries: The hobgoblin rerolls a failed attack roll.

trait.name: Brutal Display
entries: When the hobgoblin reduces a creature to 0 hit points, the hobgoblin immediately executes it in a brutal and gory display of violence.

Each hostile creature within 30 feet of the hobgoblin that can see the act must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the hobgoblin for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a successful save.

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Shield Bash

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Riposte
entries: When a creature that the hobgoblin can see misses it with a melee attack, the hobgoblin can use its reaction to make a melee weapon attack against that creature.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hobgoblin is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}). It has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Magnetic Propulsion (3/Day)
entries: The hobgoblin can move up to 20 feet in a straight line without provoking opportunity attacks and without using any of its movement. The hobgoblin can use this movement in the following ways:

trait.name: Defense
entries: The hobgoblin uses its Magnetic Propulsion as a reaction when hit with an attack or when forced to make a Dexterity saving throw. When used in this manner, the hobgoblin makes Dexterity saving throws with advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Offense
entries: The hobgoblin uses its Magnetic Propulsion as a bonus action on its turn. When used in this manner, the hobgoblin makes its next melee weapon attack with advantage and deals one extra die of damage on a hit.

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target, {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage if wielded with two hands.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hobgoblin is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Arcane and Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with an attack if that target is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin and that ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Army Arcana
entries: When the hobgoblin casts a spell that causes damage or that forces other creatures to make a saving throw, it can choose itself and any number of allies to be immune to the damage caused by the spell and to succeed on the required saving throw.

trait.name: Lay Waste
entries: Using a bonus action, the hobgoblin can double the radius or range of its damaging spells.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hobgoblin makes two glaive attacks. It can replace one attack with a spell of 1st level or lower.

action.name: Glaive
